item.description:
Middletown Pizza War

 

First there was Grinders for Grace, now  comes the Middletown Pizza War to benefit St. Vincent de Paul Middletown.  The Middletown Pizza War, organized by Feed the People Charity and co-sponsored by The Middletown Press will be a battle of pies you won't want to miss!     

 

Come to the Sons of Italy hall, 76 Court St in Middletown, on May 17th between 5-8 p.m. Admission is $10 per person or $25 per family with children under 16 years of age. You will get to try 11 different Middletown pizzas and have a chance to vote on which restaurant in Middletown has the best pizza!  Area restaurants competing for the title of Best Pizza include Alpha Pizza, Dominoes, Empire Pizza, Famous Pizza, First and Last Restaurant, Illiano's Pizza, Mondo Restaurant, Pizza Palace, Roberto's Restaurant, Sammy's Restaurant, Tommy's Restaurant.  

           

Feed the People Charity was founded in 2007, has three annual events each year that benefit St. Vincent de Paul Middletown, the Rocky Hill Food Bank and Hartford's South Park Inn. All proceeds of Middletown Pizza War will benefit St. Vincent de Paul Middletown programs including Amazing Grace Food Pantry, the Soup Kitchen, and Community Assistance.
item.name: Middletown Pizza War
